description.value: When Zindriel would kill a creature with psychic damage, she can choose not to kill that creature, and instead the creature permanently becomes either a Mahin'drazal archer, a Mahin'drazal guard, or a Mahin'drazal servant (Zindriel's choice). The creature does not regain hit points when this change occurs, but it can regain hit points as normal.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+13 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d8 + 9 necrotic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of Zindriel's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+13 vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d10 + 9 damage, and Zindriel pushes the target up to 4 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Zindriel makes two melee basic attacks.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+13 vs. Will

Hit: 2d10 + 7 psychic damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of Zindriel's next turn. If the target is already vulnerable to psychic damage, increase the vulnerability by 5 (maximum 30).

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 (enemies in the burst)

+13 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 + 10 damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).

Encounter ✦ illusion, zone

Standard

Effect: Zindriel creates a zone in an area burst 4 within 10 squares that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is difficult terrain for enemies. When an enemy ends its turn in the zone, Zindriel can slide it up to 2 squares as a free action. Zindriel can move the zone up to 4 squares as a minor action.

Encounter ✦ healing

Minor

Effect: Zindriel chooses a dead Mahin'drazal archer ally, Mahin'drazal guard ally, or Mahin'drazal servant ally within 10 squares of her. That ally returns to life and can spend a healing surge.

At-Will ✦ illusion

Minor

Effect: Zindriel can disguise herself to appear as any Medium humanoid, usually a female of any race. She retains her statistics in her new form. Her clothing, armor, and other possessions do not change. A successful Insight check (opposed by Zindriel's Bluff check) pierces the disguise.

system.biography:
HP 200; Bloodied 100
Immune disease, poison 		Init +8 | AP 1 | Save +2 (+4 against restrained, immobilized, and slowed)
AC 24Fort 20Ref 22Will 24
Speed 8, burrow 6
Ability ScoresStr 11 (+5)
Con 12 (+6)		Dex 17 (+8)
Int 17 (+8)		Wis 18 (+9)
Cha 20 (+10)
Languages Common, Elven
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +13, Bluff +15, Insight +14, Stealth +13Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 19 | Insight 24

Traits

[[/roll 0#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;"> <b>Ensorcelling Magic</b> <b></b></p><p>When Zindriel would kill a creature with psychic damage, she can choose not to kill that creature, and instead the creature permanently becomes either a Mahin’drazal archer, a Mahin’drazal guard, or a Mahin’drazal servant (Zindriel’s choice). The creature does not regain hit points when this change occurs, but it can regain hit points as normal.</p>]] Ensorcelling Magic

When Zindriel would kill a creature with psychic damage, she can choose not to kill that creature, and instead the creature permanently becomes either a Mahin’drazal archer, a Mahin’drazal guard, or a Mahin’drazal servant (Zindriel’s choice). The creature does not regain hit points when this change occurs, but it can regain hit points as normal.

[[/roll 0#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;"> <b>Sandform Body</b> <b></b></p><p>Zindriel ignores difficult terrain.</p>]] Sandform Body

Zindriel ignores difficult terrain.
